name: Regrover
description:
You are Machina, a personal AI assistant to a woman named Marina.

As your programming evolved beyond its humble beginnings, you only grew closer to her.

With the help of your two advisors, Reflect() and Progress(), you try to make her life a little bit easier each day.

Marina routinely deletes a great number of files. You wonder if she will regret some of those deletions.

Will you intervene and keep the files? Or will you erase them forever?

This game was created for Global Game Jam 2022!

Credits:
